author: cnbc.com
title: The Rubicon Project: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
LOS ANGELES (AP) _ The Rubicon Project Inc. (RUBI) on Thursday reported a loss of $27.8 million in its first quarter.
The Los Angeles-based company said it had a loss of 56 cents per share. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 44 cents per share.
The digital ad exchange operator posted revenue of $24.9 million in the period.
In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, the company's shares hit $2.32. A year ago, they were trading at $5.71.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on RUBI at https://www.zacks.com/ap/RUBI
